c1.name: Shards Are Gems Too
c1.descriptionRaw:
When Kachina mounts or dismounts <color=#FFD780FF>Turbo Twirly</color>, she will absorb nearby Elemental Shards created by Crystallize.
Additionally, when a party member picks up such a Shard, 3 Energy will be restored to Kachina. Energy can be restored this way once every 5s.
c1.description:
When Kachina mounts or dismounts Turbo Twirly, she will absorb nearby Elemental Shards created by Crystallize.
Additionally, when a party member picks up such a Shard, 3 Energy will be restored to Kachina. Energy can be restored this way once every 5s.

c2.name: Never Leave Home Without... Turbo Twirly
c2.descriptionRaw: When Kachina uses <color=#FFD780FF>"Time to Get Serious!"</color>, she will regain 20 Nightsoul points. If there is no <color=#FFD780FF>Turbo Twirly</color> belonging to her on the field, she will enter Nightsoul's Blessing and summon one.
c2.description: When Kachina uses "Time to Get Serious!", she will regain 20 Nightsoul points. If there is no Turbo Twirly belonging to her on the field, she will enter Nightsoul's Blessing and summon one.

c3.name: Improved Stabilizer
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Go, Go Turbo Twirly!</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Go, Go Turbo Twirly! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: More Foes, More Caution
c4.descriptionRaw: When there are 1/2/3/4 (or more) opponents within the Turbo Drill Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>"Time to Get Serious!"</color>, the active character within the field gains 8%/12%/16%/20% increased DEF.
c4.description: When there are 1/2/3/4 (or more) opponents within the Turbo Drill Field created by "Time to Get Serious!", the active character within the field gains 8%/12%/16%/20% increased DEF.

c5.name: All I've Collected Till Now
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Time to Get Serious!</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Time to Get Serious! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: This Time, I've Gotta Win
c6.descriptionRaw: When your active character's Shield is replaced or destroyed for any reason, Kachina will deal 200% of her DEF as <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.
c6.description: When your active character's Shield is replaced or destroyed for any reason, Kachina will deal 200% of her DEF as AoE Geo DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 5s.
